characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the start of the fight phase you may activate the combat stimms - If so, roll a D6. On a 1. One Ogryn in the unit is immediately slain. on a 2-6, each Ogryn increases their attack characteristick by 1. On a 6, each Ogryn in the unit gains D3 Attacks (roll for each unit)
